column4: for some reason only one program can use audio at once, for some reason (or something) is there a fix?
ALSA programs dont' do that.  Only old OpenSoundSystem (OSS) programs do, afaik.
like, if i open rhythmbox, i can hear it, but if i open audacity after it i cant hear it, and vice versa
well i have my sound preferences set to ALSA...
